[[1978â79 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1978â79]] |} The [[1977â78 Turkish First Football League|1977â78]] season was the sixth season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish First Football League|First League]], the first level division in [[Turkey]]. They have relegated to second division at the end of the season. It was the second relegation from first division after [[1973â74 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1973â74]]. Team's ba performance continued in Cup matches as well. The team started to season with coach Kadri AytaÃ§. However AytaÃ§ left the club and became the manger of Rizespor after 7th round. Trainers Seyfi Alanya and Turgut Kafkas managed the team for the rest of the first half games. Orhan YÃ¼ksel became the coach at the start of the second half of the season. YÃ¼ksel completed the season. ==Pre-season== The team has prepared for the season at UludaÄ. Preparation games: * 07.08.1977 - BalÄ±kesirspor-MÄ°Y: 3-0. * The team played two jubilee matches on 10 august for Garay from Adana Demirspor and GÃ¼ray from MÄ°Y on 17 August. * 18.08.1977 - MÄ°Y-Gaziantepspor: 1-1. ==1977â78 league participation== [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] was played with 16 teams in its 21st season, [[1977â78 Turkish First Football League|1977â78]]. Last two teams relegated to [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1978â79 Turkish Second Footbal League|1978â79]]. Mersin Ä°Y finished 16th with 3 wins and relegated to second division next year.
